ResourceHeader.ResourceName: DE 1 Plasma Waves Instrument (PWI) Low Frequency Receiver B data
AlternateName: Dynamics Explorer 1 PWI LFC B data

RevisionEvent.Note: Only known prior ReleaseDate of the metadata

Added PublicationInfo. Added ResourceType and NamingAuthority. Changed http to https in top-level schemaLocation attribute. Fixed version number separator in top-level schemaLocation attribute. Matched version number in schemaLocation attribute to updated value in Version tag. ZCB

ResourceHeader.Description: Plasma Waves Instrument Low Frequency Receiver B data

InformationURL.Name: NSSDC's Master Catalog on the Plasma Wave Instrument
InformationURL.Description: Introduction to the Plasma Wave Instrument on DE1

AccessURL.Name: Plasma Waves Instrument Low Frequency Receiver B Electric and Magnetic field data
AccessURL.Description: This URL contains the DE1 PWI Step Frequency Receiver B Electric and Magnetic Field Data

NumericalData.ProviderResourceName: Plasma Waves Instrument Low Frequency Receiver B

TimeSpan.Note: Time format in data files is: milliseconds of the day

Parameter.Name: Universal Time
Parameter.Description: Universal Time columns from left to right are: yeardoy msec in the format of yyddd msec.

Structure.Description: Universal Time expressed using a 6-column day, month, year, hour, minute, second representation

Parameter.Name: DE1 Plasma Wave Instrument  Low Frequency Receiver B
Parameter.Description: PWI LFC B  frequencies in Hz

Parameter.Name: DE1 Plasma Wave Instrument  Low Frequency Receiver B
Parameter.ParameterKey: PWI LFC B electric field amplitude values
Parameter.Description: PWI LFC B  electric field amplitude values in ((V/m)^2)/Hz. Note that the data files can be divided into multiple sections. Some for Ex values. Some for Ez, and some for B. The next column to the right indicates the measured value.

Parameter.Name: DE1 Plasma Wave Instrument Low Frequency Receiver B
Parameter.ParameterKey: PWI LFC B magnetic field amplitude values
Parameter.Description: PWI LFC B  magnetic field amplitude values in ((nT)^2)/Hz. Note that the data files can bedivided into multiple sections. Some for Ex values. Some for Ez, and some for B. The next column to the right indicates the measured value.

Parameter.Name: DE1 Plasma Wave Instrument Low Frequency Receiver B
Parameter.ParameterKey: PWI LFC B Antenna(s) used for measurement
Parameter.Description: PWI LFC B Antenna(s) used for measurement: EX or EZ or ES. Nothing is measured. This is a flag to indicate the type of measurement made: EX, EZ, ES, and B.

Parameter.Name: DE1 spacecraft position vector inerpolated to 1 sec resolution
Parameter.Description: Location of the spacecraft in magnetic coordinates in units of Re, Re, local time, and latitude
